column3: Frankly, it's a relief to have a capable adventurer like you on board. As I said, we managed to salvage some supplies from the wreck. I can hook you up whatever you need─for a nominal fee, of course, hehe.
Well, that turned complicated fast. And there I was pondering ways for the House to get a foot in Sui–no–Sato's doors...

It all hinges on this, <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>. Let's show that Jikkan what he's missing out on by shutting out the world. Hmmm, a sampling of the delights of Sanjo Hanamachi might not go astray...
Right, <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>. Let's see to it Sui–no–Sato has such a damned fine signature product, Jikkan won't have any room to complain!
Keep up the good work, <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>. The House's coffers─er...I mean, Kurenai and her people are depending on you!
